Financial Results:

The Board recommended a dividend of ₹10 per equity share for the fiscal year ended March 31, 2025.

The company's consolidated revenue for the year ending March 2025 was ₹148,477.89 Crore, with a net profit of ₹7,459.54 Crore.

Business Operations:

The company is actively expanding its paints business under the brand "Birla Opus," with 5 out of 6 planned plants already operational by March 2025.

Grasim also launched "Birla Pivot", a B2B online marketplace for building materials,according to Grasim.

Awards & Recognition:Grasim was recognized as a Sustainable Organization 2025 by The Times Group's Global Sustainability Alliance (GSA). They also won the "Masters of Risk - Conglomerate" award at the India Risk Management Awards 2025.

Key Personnel:The company welcomed Mr. Hemant Kadel as the new Chief Financial Officer (CFO).
